responses.title: Take your best shot. I will.
I come: Lock, stock and barrel.
I call the shots around here.
Sniper here! Time for target practice.
Let's have a go at it!
You can run but you can't hide!
Now that's what I call stoppin' power.
Oh, I thought I had that for sure!
My aim is truer than ever!
Ooh, more powder in my shot!
You make a great bullet catcher.
Your life's a flash in the pan.
Hee hee hee hee hee hee hee hee hee hee!
Gunfighting's tough without a gun, isn't it?
Heh, crummiest gun I've ever seen.
Get a gun, you'll live longer!
Guns are the future, my friend!
You pull a knife, I pull a gun.
Someone brought a knife to a gunfight!
You never hear the one that gets you.
Didn't think you had the brass!
That was a hell of a recoil.
Huh, back at the shooting gallery.
Hm hm hm, my trigger finger's itching for vengeance!
Never could resist a long shot.
There's not much wrong that killing you wouldn't fix.
Killing is the last resort, true. But the other resorts don't even have a pool.
Dying is easy. Here, let me show you.
Why am I smiling? This is what trigger-happy looks like.
As long as there are two heroes left on the battlefield, someone is gonna want someone dead.
Ah, this will come in handy.
Oh, Manta! Hee hee hee hee!
Oh, Manta! Ha ha ha ha!
It's sort of a full metal jacket.
Heh heh heh heh ha ha ha!
Hee hee hee hee hee hee hee!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Dah! There goes the whole shootin' match!
Hee hee hee hee hee hee hee hee hee hee!
Out of visual range! He he he he!
Ah, this will come in handy.
